issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
On droid 2 2.2, if you enter the test and exit multiple times you will eventually get to a state where when you click on the test, rather that the test opening immediately and showing the animation there is a delay and then only a black screen is shown.  This is suspected to a be a threading deadlock issue.  V8 only.

Reported that the issue cannot be reproduced on several other devices with 2.3 and up.
fields.summary: Android: V8: KS locks up sometimes when exiting Base UI->Views->Image Views->Image Rapid Update

comments.body: Tried many times on 2.2 Nexus One, but cannot reproduce this issue.
cannot repro tested with droid 2.2.3 on 1.9.0.v20120207124634 with v8 and rhino
